title: Ticket #647: condor_q -xml -format missing <classads> tag
description:
condor_q can do projections with -format

condor_q -xml outputs classads in xml format

condor_q -xml -format DUMMY ClusterId outputs classads that only have ClusterId, which is nice, but without the top level tag found with just -xml
check_ins: 2009-Aug-11 13:28   Check-in [15298]: Added xml header and footer to show_queue_buffered() to make it consistent with show_queue(). Whether intentional or not, some combination of -xml plus other arguments to condor_q causes show_queue_buffered() to be called rather than show_queue(). Now the same xml header and footer are printed in both [...] (By Dan Bradley )
creator: matt
